title: ‘Hubie Halloween’ and 25 Horror Movies Classics
description:
In the terrifying year of 2020, we needed our horror correspondent to weigh in on the state of the genre, so Chris Ryan joins Sean to talk about the new Adam Sandler Netflix vehicle ‘Hubie Halloween,’ the best horror flicks of the year so far, and 20 underrated scary movie classics.

Host: Sean Fennessey
Guest: Chris Ryan
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
